text: "Jugband Blues" is a 1968 song by Pink Floyd. It was taken from their second studio album A Saucerful of Secrets. It was written by Syd Barnett. It was his last contribution with the band before his dismissal in 1968. The promo video was filmed in December 1967. The original was lost until it was rediscovered in 1999. Category:1968 songs Category:1960s ballads Category:Folk ballads Category:Pink Floyd songs
title: Jugband Blues
